name: Gatus
description: A self-hosted status page for monitoring services.

variables.name: monitor_host
variables.description: The hostname or IP of the service to monitor (e.g., example.com)

variables.name: monitor_path
variables.description: The path to monitor on the host (default: /)

variables.name: monitor_port
variables.description: The port of the service to monitor (default: 80)

variables.name: alert_threshold
variables.description: The number of failed checks before triggering an alert (default: 3)

variables.name: username
variables.description: Username to access the Gatus dashboard

variables.name: password
variables.description: Password to access the Gatus dashboard
